Title: Jarilike
Writer: Luka Friscic (screenplay), Marko Friscic (screenplay), Matija Sever (novel)
Actors: Tibor Friscic, Matija Sever, Ivan Stanko, Barbara Petrinjak
Plot: It's the beginning of 9th century. When a 16 year old Slav finds his parents murdered by the barbarians he sets of on an epic adventure in a search for revenge. Along the way he meets a lot...
